name: Dartrix
description: A bit of a dandy, it spends its free time preening its wings. Its preoccupation with any dirt on its plumage can leave it unable to battle.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups GRASS moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Long Reach
abilities.effect: A move used by this Pokémon will not make contact.
abilities.description: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.
